contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with me, I'll be happy to talk to you! If you are a developer, please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or suggestions, or even send me your code to talk about it!

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Check out some of my side and professional projects. You will be able to see the technologies used, the code and the live demo of many of them.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Experiences, thoughts, explanations and other things about my day to day as a developer.

description: Currently, I'm leading a team working on an internal system for Endeavor to facilitate information access for the staff across 40+ offices worldwide.
My role involves coding with high technical standards, providing technical guidance, conducting code reviews, and collaborating on estimations and roadmap planning.
Previously, I had the opportunity to work on projects in various sectors, including education, gaming, and NGOs.
I contributed to building the foundational elements of the company's applications in its early stages.
This included the development of the landing page, the student app, the payment tracking app, and the initial design system library.
